author: prestonvanloon
content: We're planning to cut a new release tomorrow with Altona support and encourage users to try it out. Current release candidate is commit a9bbbae19abac0c3c8cf7c4213b949172f97cf57. Only two commits in master since that RC, but if anyone is running Prysm and has an issue we need to cherry pick. Please let me know by 00:00 UTC June 29. Thanks and happy genesis launch!
